document_data.name: Rylatar'ralah'tyma
document_data.mainbody: '''Rylatar'ralah'tyma''', also known as simply '''Rylatar''', was a [[red dragon]] dwelling in the [[Forest of Wyrms]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web enhancement/Roll Call of Dragons}}
document_data.Description: Rylatar was around 80 feet (24 meters) long. Her scales were crimson-colored and her wings were a deep indigo color.
document_data.Personality: Rylatar claimed to not be fond of anything,
document_data.Possessions: Rylatar had a [[silver]] ring in the shape of a winged dragon eating its own tail, which had the power to change her shape into the form of a [[human]] or [[elf]].
